SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_GETCHILDCOUNTTEXT
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get the number of children associated with an interaction in text for 1-10
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_GETCHILDCOUNTTEXT( @interactionID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns nvarchar(10) with execute as caller as begin declare @childCountText nvarchar(10) = '' declare @childCount int = 0 select @childCount = count(SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID) from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONCHILDREN where INTERACTIONID=@interactionID if @childCount is not null set @childCountText = case @childCount when 1 then 'one' when 2 then 'two' when 3 then 'three' when 4 then 'four' when 5 then 'five' when 6 then 'six' when 7 then 'seven' when 8 then 'eight' when 9 then 'nine' when 10 then 'ten' else cast(@childCount as nvarchar(10)) end
return @childCountText end
